attributes.action: Family breakdown financial and children matters.
attributes.additional_details: The breakdown of family is traumatic many instances have come to my attention where a splitting partner/husband/wife can manipulate the existing system and be in a much better financial standing, Therefore encouraging disintegration. With long lasting impact on young children and cohabitants.
attributes.background:
. Check household incomes after and during separation/divorce.
. Compare household incomes.
. 3 monthly tax reports for self employed.
. Regular checks on parties using bankruptcy as avoidance.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
